00001 #include "mmlpixmap.h"
00002 #include <mathml/mmldocument.h>
00003 #include <cmath>

00005 MMLPixmap::MMLPixmap() {
00006     m_border = 4;
00007     m_outline = false;
00008     m_mustLayout = true;
00009     m_mustPaint = true;
00010     m_doc = 0;
00011     m_buffer = QPixmap(1, 1);
00012     m_painter.setPainter(&m_qpainter);
00013 }
00014 void
00015 MMLPixmap::setDocument(const MMLDocument *doc) {
00016     m_doc = doc;
00017     m_mustLayout = true;
00018 }
00019 void
00020 MMLPixmap::layout() {
00021     m_qpainter.begin(&m_buffer);
00022     m_qpainter.setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing);
00023     m_qpainter.setFont(m_font);
00024 
00025     m_doc->setPainter(&m_painter);
00026     m_doc->layout();
00027     m_qpainter.end();
00028 
00029     // obtain the dimensions of the document
00030     float ascent = 0;
00031     float height = 0;
00032     float maxwidth = 0;
00033     bool more = true;
00034     int view = 0;
00035     do {
00036         m_doc->setCurrentView(view++);
00037         m_doc->setX(0);
00038         m_doc->setY(height);
00039         more = m_doc->setMaxViewWidth(1000);
00040         ascent += m_doc->getAscent();
00041         height += m_doc->getHeight();
00042         float w = m_doc->getWidth();
00043         if (w > maxwidth) maxwidth = w;
00044     } while (more);
00045     m_ascent = (int)ceil(ascent);
00046     m_w = int(ceil(maxwidth + 2*m_border));
00047     m_h = int(ceil(height + 2*m_border));
00048     if (m_w > 1000) m_w = 1000;
00049     if (m_h > 1000) m_h = 1000;
00050 
00051     m_mustLayout = false;
00052 }
00053 void
00054 MMLPixmap::repaint() {
00055     if (m_mustLayout) layout();
00056 
00057     if (m_buffer.width() != m_w || m_buffer.height() != m_h) {
00058         m_buffer = QPixmap(m_w, m_h);
00059         printf("resize: %i, %i\n", m_w, m_h);
00060     }
00061 
00062     // initialize the buffer and painter
00063     m_qpainter.begin(&m_buffer);
00064     m_qpainter.setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing);
00065     m_qpainter.setFont(m_font);
00066     m_qpainter.setBackground(m_painter.getPalette().background());
00067     int w = m_buffer.width();
00068     int h = m_buffer.height();
00069     m_qpainter.eraseRect(0, 0, w, h);
00070     m_qpainter.translate(m_border, m_ascent + m_border);
00071 
00072     // paint all the views below each other
00073     for (ushort i=0; i < m_doc->countViewPorts(); ++i) {
00074         m_doc->setCurrentView(i);
00075         m_doc->paint();
00076     }
00077 
00078     // paint a border
00079     if (m_outline) {
00080         QPen pen = m_qpainter.pen();
00081         pen.setColor(Qt::red);
00082         pen.setWidthF(1);
00083         m_qpainter.setPen(pen);
00084         w -= 2*m_border;
00085         h -= 2*m_border;
00086         m_qpainter.drawRect(QRectF(-0.5, -m_ascent-0.5, w+1, h+1));
00087     }
00088     m_qpainter.end();
00089     m_mustPaint = false;
00090 }
00091 const QPixmap &
00092 MMLPixmap::getPixmap() {
00093     if (m_mustLayout || m_mustPaint) repaint();
00094     return m_buffer;
00095 }
